name: Easy Ad Picker
author: Easyadpicker.com

sections.description:
EASY ADVERTISING WITH EASY AD PICKER

Easy Ad Picker (EAP) is a WordPress Plugin that lets you create ads with affiliate links from different Affiliate Networks. You can easily show products from different advertisers, create a collage of products or add dynamic banners to your posts and pages.

Why Easy Ad Picker:
– Simple ad creation
– Simple ad management
– No technical/programming skills required
– Relevant ads related to your posts
– Up-to-date ads, products from feeds
– Import feeds from advertisers with one click without technical knowledge
– Create custom ads per post/page
– Different ad styles like: List of advertisers (that offer product X), Product overviews, Collages, Dynamic Banners

GET STARTED IN FOUR EASY STEPS

  1. Download,install and activate the Easy Ad Picker plugin
  2. Connect your Affiliate Networks
  3. Import all campagnes/advertisers that you have been approved for
  4. Start creating your first ad

EASY AD PICKER THE IDEAL HUB

Easy Ad Picker acts as a hub between the website and the Affiliate Networs to improve the cooperation with the advertisers. Easy Ad Picker doesn’t store user data and doesn’t have access to personal data from Affiliate Networks like: coversion data or click data. To make the WordPress Plugin work optimal and stable we use our API. This API makes the import and processing of campaigns and products from advertisers fast and easy.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Add new way to promote products of advertisers
  • Add delete products of advertisers
  • Load advertisments after page load
